text:
Had a fantastic dining experience at SaffronSips! The ambiance is warm and inviting, making it perfect for a relaxed meal. The food was well-prepared, flavorful, and satisfying.
The service was excellent, with attentive staff who genuinely care about their customers.
Highly recommended for anyone looking for authentic Indian cuisine in Bedok Reservoir Village! Will definitely visit again.

Had dinner at this cozy new restaurant tucked away at a nook of Bedok Reservoir and was pleasantly surprised to find Indian cuisine. A rare gem in this area! The food was delicious and full of flavour, and I really appreciated that they were able to customize a dish to my preference. The server was warm and friendly, making the whole experience even more enjoyable.
The food is really delicious. We come by quite often as we love the food. And the ambiance is great too, next to Bedok Reservoir. Service is good. Highly recommended.
Delicious new joint at Bedok reservoir serving up tasty Indian food! Hospitality is great and the food served is fresh, piping hot, and really hits the spot.

Did not know what to expect as the restaurant was new, but the food was so good. We ordered a vegetable biryani, butter chicken and garlic naan with drinks to share for two people. Only photos I have is of one of the pieces of garlic naan and our finished meal unfortunately. Looking forward to returning for future meals!
